# Optional GOST Cryptography Support
#
# These dependencies are required ONLY if you need GOST R 34.10-2012 and GOST R 34.11-2012 support.
# Install with: pip install -r requirements-gost.txt
#
# Note: These packages may not be available in all environments.
# If installation fails, you can use the service with RSA only.

# GOST cryptography libraries (uncomment and install if needed)
# pygost>=5.0.0
# cryptography-gost>=1.0.0

# Alternative GOST implementation
# gostcrypto>=1.2.0
